name: DE-BUG: The Unfinished Project
description:
Submission for 'Game Off 2021'.

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • E to interact with object.
  • Click the 'Notes' on the combat mechanics.

Combat Guide:

1. The combat start by :

  • Placing a special tile.
  • Spawning a node by clicking the 'Blue' tile.

2. Each turn will have the a time limit of 6 seconds except for the initial player turn which is 30 minutes.

3. The node will have 3 states:

  • Ghost state : Ignore other special tiles and doesn't hurt either side.
  • Blue state : Heal player and hurt enemy.
  • Red state : Hurt player and heal enemy.

4. Special tiles have various effects, check the 'Notes'.

Thank you for playing.
